docs.title: Welcome to WorldEnder.ai
docs.text:
A text-adventure RPG about world ending events--and recovering from them!

Massively multiplayer, with many langauge models to choose from.

docs.title: Roadmap
docs.text:
• Fight to keep the world population from reaching 0
  • Meet other players who occupy other cities
  • Customize your AI

docs.title: Get involved
docs.text:
• Contribute to the open source project WorldEnder.ai on Github
  • Follow @keppylab_ai on X

Built by James @ KeppyLab
